blood_on_the_altar.text: This card’s first ability should read: “Forced – After you fail a skill test while investigating the Burned Ruins: Flip 1 clue token on the Burned Ruins to its doom side.

where_doom_awaits.text: The two instructions on this card should be reversed, as follows: “Remove all clues from each location in play. The arcane presence masking the path further up the hill has faded. Reveal Ascending Path.”

decay.text: This card’s Revelation ability should read: “Discard [[Item]] assets from your play area and/or from your hand…”

echoes_of_the_past.text: The first ability should read: “Skip the ‘Place 1 doom on the current agenda’ step of the Mythos phase.”
This location’s ability should read: “While investigating this location, your [intellect] cannot be increased.”

the_unspeakable_oath.text: Each of these locations should not have the “[[Arkham Asylum]]” trait.

the_pallid_mask.text: This location’s ability should read: “…If you succeed, look at the revealed side of any Catacombs location in play.”
This enemy’s ability should read: “…If you succeed, look at the revealed side of any Catacombs location in play.”

dim_carcosa.text: This act’s second ability should read: “Hastur cannot be defeated unless an investigator ‘knows the secret.’”
This card’s Revelation ability should read: “Discard cards from your play area and/or from your hand…”

at_deaths_doorstep.text: This card’s ability should read: “Locations cannot be flipped to their non-[[Spectral]] side.”

the_wages_of_sin.text: This card’s ability should read: “Locations cannot be flipped to their [[Spectral]] side.”
This card’s first ability should read: “Keep this card in your threat area (this side faceup). If you are eliminated, flip it over.”

before_the_black_throne.text: This card’s second line of game text should read: “Shuffle each empty space into its owner’s deck and each location in play other than Hideous Palace into the Cosmos.”
This card’s second line of game text should read: “Shuffle each empty space into its owner’s deck and each location in play other than Court of the Great Old Ones into the Cosmos.”

alien_interference.text: This card’s first ability should read: “Forced – When Otherworldly Meddler would take damage from an attack: Remove 1 doom from Otherworldly Meddler. Then, reduce the damage dealt by 1.”
